entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_10_MSG: You can add a 4 digit password. A password is needed to enter a password protected Room.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_11_MSG: You can enter a short message to convey to others your mission and so forth.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_12_MSG: Select a Quest. Choose from the various missions one which fits your strengths and goals.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_13_MSG: Confirm the details of your Quest. However, only the Room Master can select a Quest, so you are unable to here.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_14_MSG: Select the Raid Class for the Quest you wish to go on. The more stars, the harder a mission is, so choose wisely.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_15_MSG: Which Quest Class are you going with? Select the one you wish to see.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_16_MSG: Limited Time Trial is over! Raid Battle is currently closed. Please wait until we reopen.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_17_MSG: The new trial isn\'t ready yet! I\'m preparing a super powerful mock Unit so you\'d better get ready.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_18_MSG: You think you have what it takes to defeat my mock Units? You should be really familiar with your opponent this time! I wonder how long you\'ll last?
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_19_MSG: Hmm, you\'re better than I expected. However, if you think you can beat my next Unit, you\'re wrong! I doubt you\'ll even be able to survive the first blow!
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_1_MSG: Please select a World. You can directly enter the Room in which a Friend is playing by selecting them through the Friend Search.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_20_MSG: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You\'re in for a shock once you start fighting them!
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_21_MSG: Hmm. I don\'t think I can let you try this one yet. Why don\â€™t you try the St. Lamia quest first and then come back?
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_22_MSG: Select Raid Class and Playing Style. You can't select a class higher than your own, but you can select one lower. Fight alongside other Summoners.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_23_MSG: Set password and Auto-join settings. Set Auto-join to off to prevent other Summoners from automatically joining your Room. Add a password to password protect your Room.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_24_MSG: Set Expel setting. Turn Expel on to be able to kick out other Summoners from the Room you create.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_25_MSG:
Wow, you look really determined this time.
I don't like that at all.
But that's just fine!
I'm looking forward to seeing how long you can keep your spirits up.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_26_MSG:
Do you really think I'm going to acknowledge you
after that poor excuse for a battle?
Don't make me laugh.
You should go defeat the rest of the Fallen Gods first.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_27_MSG: Please select the lowest level and Quest desired. You cannot select a higher level than your own. Only Quests that you have already cleared can be selected.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_28_MSG:
Aren't you a bit tired?
Your opponent today is perfect for you.
He will definitely make you feel all the frustation
I felt while I was programming him!
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_29_MSG:
You can imagine who your next opponent will be,
can't you? Then stop wasting time,
and get ready! I won't lose next time around!
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_2_MSG: Select whether to create a Room yourself or to join someone else's. Select Auto-join Room to automatically enter an open Room.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_30_MSG:
Do you really think I'm going to acknowledge you
after that poor excuse for a battle?
Don't make me laugh.
You should go defeat the rest of the Fallen Gods first.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_31_MSG:
I have a mock Unit dying to fight you!
Do you have what it takes to face
the "Goddess of the Arena"?
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_32_MSG:
You can guess who your opponent's gonna be this
time, right? It took a lot of effort to
replicate all those special powers, you know.
Now go on and have some fun.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_33_MSG:
Do you really think I'm going to acknowledge you
after that poor excuse for a battle?
Don't make me laugh.
You should go defeat the rest of the Fallen Gods first.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_34_MSG:
This time your opponents are people you know.
They'll come at you one after the other.
It'll be completely different than before,
so I hope you enjoy yourself out there.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_35_MSG:
You summon lots of heroes for a living, but
that doesn't matter to him. After all,
he's the knight who defeated all those heroes
in the first place...
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_36_MSG:
Don't you have somewhere else to be right now?
Come back after you've beaten whomever you
need to. I'll still be here.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_37_MSG:
You summon lots of heroes for a living, but
that doesn't matter to him. After all,
he's the knight who defeated all those heroes
in the first place...
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_38_MSG:
Don't you have somewhere else to be right now?
Come back after you've beaten whomever you
need to. I'll still be here.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_39_MSG:
Lots of old friends are coming your way,
but they've really changed after some time.
I hope you enjoy your time with them though.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_3_MSG: Please enter Room conditions. Search after selecting conditions to find a Room that fits the criteria you set.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_40_MSG: You're already looking forward to the next Trial? Well, I wanted to do some more research first, but guess not. Fine, I'll show ya what I have so far! Here are the fruits of my research!
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_41_MSG: I got another special opponent for you this time. This one hadn't made an appearance here yet, but you know well enough... Can you guess who?
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_42_MSG: I got another special opponent for you this time. This one hadn't made an appearance here yet, but you know well enough... Can you guess who?
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_43_MSG: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_4_MSG: There are extra Item slots available in Raid. Don't forget to take enough supplies with you.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_5_MSG: Materials obtained during Quests will be automatically added to your Item inventory in Town.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_6_MSG: Select a Playing Style. Which style do you like? Select a style that fits you to make your mission easier.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_7_MSG: Select a Target. Team up with others to take on a common foe! Search for a Room with the same Target as you.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_8_MSG: Select a Raid Class. You can't select a class higher than your own, but you can select one lower. Fight alongside other Summoners.
entries.MST_NPC_MESSAGE_9_MSG: Select your Auto-join Room settings. Turn off Auto-join to prevent other Summoners from automatically joining your Room.
